slides.title: Investment Appraisal
slides.content:
# Capital Budgeting

## Methods

| Method | Criterion |
|--------|----------|
| NPV | > 0 |
| IRR | > WACC |
| Payback | < Target |
| MIRR | > WACC |
| PI | > 1 |

## NPV Formula

```
NPV = Sum of [CF / (1+r)^n] - I0
```

## Advantages of NPV

- Time value
- All cash flows
- Absolute value
- Additive

slides.title: Project Risk
slides.content:
# Risk Analysis

## Techniques

| Technique | Purpose |
|-----------|--------|
| Sensitivity | One variable |
| Scenario | Multiple variables |
| Simulation | Probability |
| Real options | Flexibility |

## Risk-Adjusted Rate

```
Higher risk = Higher discount rate

CAPM for project:
Ke = Rf + beta(project)(Rm - Rf)
```

## Real Options

| Option | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Delay | Wait |
| Expand | Scale up |
| Abandon | Exit |
| Switch | Flexibility |

slides.title: Cost of Capital
slides.content:
# WACC

## Formula

```
WACC = (E/V x Ke) + (D/V x Kd x (1-T))
```

## Cost of Equity - CAPM

```
Ke = Rf + beta(Rm - Rf)

beta = Systematic risk
```

## Cost of Debt

```
Pre-tax: YTM or IRR of payments
Post-tax: Kd x (1 - T)
```

## Beta Adjustment

```
Ungear: beta(a) = beta(e) / [1 + (1-T)(D/E)]
Regear: beta(e) = beta(a) x [1 + (1-T)(D/E)]
```

slides.title: Capital Structure
slides.content:
# Financing Mix

## Theories

| Theory | View |
|--------|------|
| MM (no tax) | Irrelevant |
| MM (tax) | Debt adds value |
| Trade-off | Optimal exists |
| Pecking order | Internal first |

## Tax Shield

```
Value of tax shield = D x T

More debt = More shield
But: Distress costs rise
```

## Optimal Structure

```
Minimizes WACC
Maximizes firm value
```

slides.title: Business Valuation
slides.content:
# Valuation Methods

## Approaches

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| DCF | Cash flows |
| Earnings | Multiples |
| Asset | Net assets |
| Market | Comparables |

## DCF Model

```
FCF projection
+ Terminal value
= Enterprise value
- Net debt
= Equity value
```

## Terminal Value

```
TV = FCF(1+g) / (WACC - g)
```
